changes.description:
Added the `removeTraitDefinitions` build transform to remove trait definitions
from models but leave instances intact.
Added payload binding validation to HTTP `DELETE` operations.
Updated `SmithyDiff` to emit events when traits are changed.

Fixed an issue where some `StringListTrait` instances could lose
`SourceLocation` information.
Fixed some issues in protocol tests.
Model components are now deduplicated based on location and value.
Normalize URL import filenames for better deduplication and reporting.
